page.title: 03Houghton-Family Life
page.content: As I woke up,"Uh!" I groaned & crawled out of bed.I went into the kitchen & had my breakfast of cereal milk & orange juice,then I got washed & dressed.I couldn't go into the lounge as my Dad was Hoovering so I read computer magazines in my bedroom until 11am.Then i went to my gran's with Dad until noon & then returned home for my lunch.We finished at one & then went into the lounge & read the newspapers. Then my sister asked if Dad would take her down to friend's house.After he returned we watched T.V. for 4 hours & then played on my computer for a couple of hours.At 7:30pm.my sister returned home.We then watched "Juliet Bravo", "Sorry!" & "That's life" & then I went to bed. By Mark Short,aged 10
